page.title: 16Yetholm Show
page.content: The show of sheep is of special importance with the two famous hill breeds of sheep, the South Country Ceviot and the Scottish Blackface predominating, but with the Greyface and half-bred breeds also represented. Another highlight is the sheep dog trial, not only for the skilled handling competitors, but increasingly to the many visitors from varied walks of life. Classes of foxhounds and Border Terriers are also judged. The Industrial Tent includes outstanding exhibits of vegetables and flowers, home made jam, home baking, knitting, needlecraft and handicraft sections are testimony to the industry and skills of this relatively small community.There is always an excellent exhibit both of craftwork and home baking by the pupils of the local school.
